name: Pokemon Unite, but it's good
description:
All Pokémon games, with combat more interesting than turn based, never have the full adventure experience of catching and training new Pokémon and I find that so fucking frustrating. So I made one myself with MOBA like combat. This is more of a proof of concept than an actual demo because making more than that would require effort. 

Showcase: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W3CFCJwW9WKr9nmYcjAqMn4-B6CWBTpx/view?usp=shari...
